title: Harvesting Health Traditional Naturopath | Socorro Naturopathic Practitioner
description: Trying to find a Naturopathic Doctor in Socorro? Call Harvesting Health Traditional Naturopath. We provide a consultation with a detailed questionnaire and live and dried blood microscopy services.
cleaned_text: Located in Socorro, Texas at the Bodega Loya organic farm. Harvesting Health's philosophy is quite simple. Focus on and bring satisfaction to our clients with personalized care in a safe loving environment using natural or naturopathic means backed by science.
